name: Maliwan Technology
tagline: The Success of Our Customers is Our Success Too
description:
Maliwan Technology is an experienced IT outsourcing company, offering premium custom offshore development services.
Being established in 2013, a team of young and ambitious IT specialists has quickly grown to a prosperous software development company with its main headquarter in L’viv, Ukraine.
Due to the high-quality services provided, our company has quickly gained a global recognition. We work with various customers all over the world and gain  experience to always be up-to-date.
Today, Maliwan Technology cooperates with customers worldwide and provides a wide range of nearshore development and offshore outsourcing services.
